**Example**

```esql
row x = "2024-01-01"::datetime | eval y = x + "3 hours"::time_duration, z = x - to_timeduration("3 hours");
```

| x:datetime | y:datetime | z:datetime |
| --- | --- | --- |
| 2024-01-01 | 2024-01-01T03:00:00.000Z | 2023-12-31T21:00:00.000Z |
